duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform data analysis and reporting to support procurement processes and decision-making.
Utilize Power BI for creating charts, pivots, and filter usage to visualize and communicate procurement data.
Utilize SAP MM for material management and maintain a high level of familiarity with SAP transaction MD04.
Handle SAP Sales Order creation, edit, and inquiry activities, with preference for experience in SAP transaction VA03.
Demonstrate strong Excel skills for data manipulation, including VLOOKUP, Concatenate, Pivot Tables, and file upload.
Execute SAP transaction ME53N and ME23N for procurement-related activities.
